service_figures: INT has established a Dedicated Analytics Centre of Excellence (CoE) in 2021 and has been recognized as a seasoned vendor for top data science and GenAI service providers in 2023. The company has been ranked among the top 500 data science companies in India in 2022 and is listed as one of the top 100 most promising data science companies in the same year. Looking ahead, INT is projected to be a growth vendor for top MLOps and GenAI service providers by 2025, indicating a strong trajectory in the data science and analytics sector.
